title: Monster Mania #02 [1967-01]
description: Monster Mania was a short-lived 1960s movie monster/horror magazine with nice production values which was published by Renaissance Productions and edited by Russ Jones of Creepy fame. It unfortunately lasted only three issues. This is an alternate scan of issue #02 in higher resolution than the one previously posted here. Monster Mania #02 [1967-01] ("Tribute To Hammer Issue") . Wraparound cover artwork by Frank Frazetta. Articles include: "Horror Is My Business" ("A candid interview with Terence Fisher, Hammer's dynamic director"); "Mania Film Review" ("A sneak peek at "One Million Years B.C.", the latest from Hammer"); "The Intriguing World Of Hammer Films" ("An accurate, detailed history of the brainchild of James Carreras"); "What's New In Monsterdom" ("Exclusive, never-before-published fotos of the monster scene"); "Hammer's Prince Of Horror" ("The life and films of Christopher Lee"); "The Peter Cushing Story Part 2" ("The exciting, intimate story of one of Hammer's top stars continues").
